Subjects: sermons, verse in; scripture texts, translations of
_description: A recurring couplet in a Latin homily translating the text: ‘Audi filia et vide’ (Ps. 44.11)

Bod26.Transcription: My doȝter my derlynggeHerkne my lore yse my thechyng
